column5: The past month I've had the wife out for Muskie a few times ..well of course as luck would have it she got her first and two more since..she's now like the rest ....addicted !!!...long story short I promised her a pink Muskie rod if she liked fishing for them ..any builders care to take on such a task ?
Would she settle for a sweet blue St Croix  LT
I'm trying ..that's what I use ..but ever since I got her that avid pearl she's got that glitter in her eye lol
St. Croix makes the Muskie Mojo and it is a nice purple/mauve shade..... and a lot less expensive than an Avid or Legend
Love is in the air, or is that, on the lake. LOL  Got yerself a keeper.
Talk to Speil on the board here if you want a pink Rod he is second to none he just made a great one for the Fish A Thon using pink I know he will build a amazing Rod for her.
Thanks for the nod guys. Shoot me a pm NES
Your in good hands with Speil,  NES
